document.title: Upper Teeth Alignment with Remote Monitoring
document.summary: Your treatment plan involves using clear aligners to adjust the alignment of your upper teeth. This is considered a straightforward case, and it's expected to take about 4â€“6 months to complete. Most of the progress will be monitored remotely, which means fewer in-office visits. To help achieve the desired movement, we'll be using attachments on your teeth. While whitening is not included in this package, the focus is on ensuring a smooth and effective alignment process with clear aligners.
key_points: Clear aligners will be used for upper teeth alignment.
Remote monitoring will track progress, reducing the need for in-office visits.
Extensive use of attachments will aid in tooth movement.
next_steps: Follow any additional guidance provided by your dental care team.
